description:
*** Turn your phone into the perfect study companion with FlashCards ***

Learn languages faster. Prep for exams anywhere. Teach your kids anytime. Even entertain yourself with fun trivia. Versatility is it's middle name.

Download from 800+ hand selected Editor's Picks. Direct access to millions of Quizlet.com sets. Import from FlashCardExchange.com, StudyStack.com, ProProfs, CSV, and more. You can even record audio for your flash cards! Did I mention versatility?

FlashCards also utilizes webOS’s unique ability to multi-task. Now you can jam to your music while you study!

Flash Cards are perfect for:
+ SAT, LSAT, MCAT, GRE, GMAT, TOEIC
+ Kids: Math, Alphabet, Coins, Sight Words, Shapes, Colors
+ Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Mandarin, Cantonese, Greek, Morse Code
+ Advaned Placement (AP), Nursing, Psychology, Computers, Arts & Literature, Law, Pilot Training
+ 65+ Fun Facts & Trivia We have it all.

Don’t pay up to $50 for a single set of cards when you can have it all on your phone with FlashCards. Download and smarten up quick, today! FlashCards is the most advanced application of it’s kind.

Find out why FlashCards is one of the highest rated apps of all time. Can you find the hidden features?

The LITE version has the full functionality of the paid version, but limits you to only 1 Flash Card set at a time. Lessons, Leitner Boxes, and Active Card study method are also disabled.
